text: Swoon is the debut studio album by British band Prefab Sprout. It was released in March 1984 through Kitchenware Records. It went to number 22 in the United Kingdom and less immediate and accessible than their later studio albums. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1984 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Prefab Sprout albums
title: Swoon (Prefab Sprout album)
